answers.answer: Some problems present themselves very slowly over time and are not diagnosable in the early stages (like the word phrases on "Let's Make A Deal"). I would continue regular follow up with the neuro-ophthalmologist. Go to Dr. Hagan's blog and read about dry eye treatment.JCH MD

i had the same problem but in different parts of my eye, when they finally did a bunch of tests they found out it was blood clots in my eyes but still dont know what from but i would look into that sounds alot like what i went through

question: About a month ago I started having slight blurred vision out of the corner of my right eye. That eye also started getting a lot dryer than my left eye and I have felt some pressure by my eye. I saw an optomitrist, a neuro-opthamologist and had an MRI and nothing showed up. I don't have diabetes. I do have thyroid and hormone imbalances, but I've had those problems for years and this only started last month. What else could be causing it?
title: Blurry vision out of corner of right eye
